originInfo.publisher: Louisiana. Dept. of Wildlife and Fisheries

mods.abstract: The above photograph shows a group of conservation agents with a large amount confiscated game taken from illegal hunters. After the disposition of the cases, the game is usually turned over to some charitable institute. At the left is Captain J.G. Appel, director of the Enforcement Division.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
